EmailTemplate.name: Finance Declined
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Customer has Been Declined Financing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Opportunity.OwnerFirstName},
Unfortunately your customer, {!Opportunity.Name} has been declined financing at this point. Please feel free to check with your Business Office Manager for details.
In the mean time, a task has been created for you to follow up with this customer in 2 months to see if their present financial situation has changed.
Best of luck!
